name: sunny spread
notes:
**designer notes:**
many people are reporting problems with the link above.  sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.  it is a problem with the administrator of the site where the pattern resides.  please try again later, you might get lucky.  because i no longer own the pattern, i am unable to "give" it to you.  sometimes you can get the pattern by going to [red heart.com][1] and choosing "free patterns".  

direct [pdf download][2] or [try this one][3].

one crocheter noted: just in case anyone wants to know. rows 1-5 take 26 yards of worsted wt. yarn. i used an i hook since i couldnâ€™t find my j.
